label: locationAddress
comment: The location address for this branch of a financial institution.
The location address for this creditor financial institution.
The location address for this debtor financial institution.

rangeIncludes.comment: The location at which a financial institution may be found or reached.

domainIncludes.comment: A sub-division of a bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business; established primarily to provide financial services and financial transactions.
A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that receives money.
A bank, building society, credit union, stock brokerage, or similar business of the party that owes money.
